thread.title: Bank Investors Fear Return of European Doom Loop

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Bank Investors Fear Return of European Doom Loop

organizations.name: bank investors fear return of european doom loop

text:
When European politics get volatile, eurozone banks feel the chill.
The collapse in Italy of attempts to form a populist government over the weekend led to a nasty sell-off in Italian government bonds and European bank stocks broadly on Monday and Tuesday.
But even worse has been the reaction of investors in banksâ€™ bonds. This matters because... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
